DialogueRecords.Text: Inventor, can you tell me the purpose for wh?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: You will have to discover the truth yourself in the ruins of the labratory where you were designed.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: The journey will be dangerous. Let me construct drones to protect you along the way.
